title: Police: 17-year-old boy shot in Annapolis
content:
ANNAPOLIS, Md. (ABC7) —
A 17-year-old boy was shot in Annapolis, Maryland Thursday evening, Annapolis Police report.
Police report, around 11 p.m. officers in the area heard gunshots in the 1100 block of Frederick Douglass Street. As officers arrived on the scene they located the teen with gunshot wounds that were not life-threatening. He was taken to a local hospital for treatment.
An investigation into the shooting remains ongoing. Police ask that anyone with information contact them at (410) 260-3439.
